text: oh inu okhulupirira! Dzitetezeni nokha ndi mabanja anu ku moto umene nkhuni zake ndi anthu ndi miyala ndipo oyangâ€™anira ake ndi angelo a mphamvu a maonekedwe oopsa amene sakana kumvera malamulo amene amalandira kuchokera kwa Mulungu ndipo amachita, mwamsanga, chilichonse chimene Mulungu wawalamula
